103.passivating_molecule: Octylammonium iodide, dodecylammonium iodide, or phenethylammonium iodide

104.perovskite_composition: FAPbI3 with added MAPbBr3 and MACl

54.perovskite_composition: Mixed halide perovskites such as MAPbI3 and MAPbBr3

58.electron_transport_layer: SnO2, C60, spiro-OMeTAD, NiOx, PTAA, PCBM
58.hole_transport_layer: SnO2, C60, spiro-OMeTAD, NiOx, PTAA, PCBM

96.passivating_molecule: tin(II) acetylacetonate, tin(IV) bis(acetylacetonate) dichloride, and tin(IV) bis(acetylacetonate) dibromide

148.perovskite_composition: CsI, PbI2, FAI, MABr, and Cs0.05 FA0.85 MA0.10 Pb(I0.97)(Br0.03)3

108.perovskite_composition: (FAPbI3)1-x(MC)x (MC is MDA2+ and Cs+ in equimolar fraction)
